Text:
'If you're a P2P retard don't even bother emailing us, because we WILL hurl abuse at you. We don't, never have and never will encourage P2P in any way, shape or form.'

you do realize this is one of the largest P2P websites ever? you just now encouraged P2P by putting this video on the internet for anyone to download. i appreciate you doing so... i just don't understand your logic in claiming not to encourage P2P. please explain...
could not play??????? win rar files only????
